More woody debris on Gisborne beaches after stormy weatherhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/more-woody-debris-on-gisborne-beaches-after-stormy-weather/ZT6OX6LSVRFJJIOBL5LMLK3Z5Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/more-woody-debris-on-gisborne-beaches-after-stormy-weather/ZT6OX6LSVRFJJIOBL5LMLK3Z5Y/ Murray RobertsonContractors shifting bigger debris on the city beaches after the storm Fri, 20 Dec 2024 02:27:52 +0000 More woody debris is piling up on city beaches, some of it quite sizeable, as a result of the week's southerly storm. Council contractors will be removing the bigger material before Christmas, but the beaches will not be finely groomed until the New Year. Photo / Murray Robertson
